thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Phillips 66 Says Entered Terms Agreement Relating To Public Offering

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Phillips 66 Says Entered Terms Agreement Relating To Public Offering
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Phillips 66:
* PHILLIPS 66 SAYS ‍​ON FEB 26, ENTERED TERMS AGREEMENT AMONG CO, CO’S UNIT PHILLIPS 66 COMPANY, UNDERWRITERS - SEC FILING
* PHILLIPS 66 - AGREEMENT RELATES TO PUBLIC OFFERING OF $500 MILLION OF ITS FLOATING RATE SENIOR NOTES DUE 2021, $800 MILLION OF ITS 3.900% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2028
* PHILLIPS 66 - AGREEMENT ALSO RELATES TO PUBLIC OFFERING OF $200 MILLION OF ITS 4.875% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2044
* PHILLIPS 66 - 2044 NOTES ARE AN ADDITIONAL ISSUANCE OF PHILLIPS 66’S 4.875% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2044 ISSUED UNDER EARLIER INDENTURE Source: ( bit.ly/2t7NQgu )
